service.name: device-sync-hub
service.description: Cross-device file and clipboard synchronization with real-time sync capabilities

health.description: Device Sync Hub health check configuration

steps.name: create-data-dirs
steps.description: Create data directories for file storage

steps.name: build-api
steps.run: cd api && go mod download && go build -o device-sync-hub-api .

steps.name: initialize-database
steps.run: if command -v psql >/dev/null 2>&1 && [ -n "${POSTGRES_URL:-}" ]; then psql "$POSTGRES_URL" -f initialization/postgres/schema.sql 2>/dev/null || echo 'Database initialization skipped (will be handled at runtime)'; else echo 'PostgreSQL not available for initialization, will be handled at runtime'; fi

steps.name: show-urls
steps.description: Display service access URLs and mobile setup instructions

develop.description: Start Device Sync Hub with API and UI servers

steps.name: start-api
steps.run: cd api && API_PORT=${API_PORT:-17865} UI_PORT=${UI_PORT:-37865} AUTH_SERVICE_URL=${AUTH_SERVICE_URL:-http://localhost:15785} AUTH_PORT=${AUTH_PORT:-15785} AUTH_UI_URL=${AUTH_UI_URL:-http://localhost:15785} STORAGE_PATH=${STORAGE_PATH:-$(pwd)/../data/files} POSTGRES_URL=${POSTGRES_URL:-postgresql://vrooli:lUq9qvemypKpuEeXCV6Vnxak1@localhost:5433/vrooli?sslmode=disable} REDIS_URL=${REDIS_URL:-redis://localhost:6379} MAX_FILE_SIZE=${MAX_FILE_SIZE:-10485760} DEFAULT_EXPIRY_HOURS=${DEFAULT_EXPIRY_HOURS:-24} THUMBNAIL_SIZE=${THUMBNAIL_SIZE:-200} ./device-sync-hub-api
steps.description: Start Go API server in background

steps.name: start-ui
steps.run: cd ui && UI_PORT=${UI_PORT} API_PORT=${API_PORT} AUTH_SERVICE_URL=${AUTH_SERVICE_URL} AUTH_UI_URL=${AUTH_UI_URL} NODE_ENV=production node server.js

steps.name: show-urls

postgres.description: PostgreSQL database for sync items and device sessions

redis.description: Optional Redis for auth caching and performance
